Title: Requires continuous work until completion for the design, construction, maintenance, or renovation of any transit facility, transportation facility, or equipment of the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Provides that in the design, construction, maintenance, or renovation of any transit facility, transportation facility, or equipment of the metropolitan transportation authority, work shall take place over a continuous period of time until such point at which the project has been completed.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to certain construction work periods for the metropolitan transportation authority; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
